price: 4. Tot Hem behoort alles wat in de hemelen is en alles wat op aarde is, en Hij is de Allerhoogste, de Allergrootste.
arabic: لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿaliyu al-ʿaẓīmu
